title: kaNDu mana
sahitya:
kaNDu mana higgidu rangayyana kANade mana nilladu


caraNam 1    malla mallara gelida rangayya mallagaNTane bigida bandu mAva kamsana konda
    caraNam 2    kattaleyanu suttire billahabbage kastUri tilakaniTTu citra mUruti cinna koLalanUduta banda
    caraNam 3    hEmakara donkana rangayya amita phala dAtane kAmita phalavIva purandara viTTala
